img_text: WHICH TRAIT IS MORE TOTAL: HIS IGNORANCE ORINCOMPETENCE? TIME THE 25TH AMMENDMENT? CLOWN IN CHIEF President Donald Trump is no longer just a joke; he's a threat AN AMERICAN EMBARRASMENT Assessing the US demise in global standing and its economic cost DEMOCRACY UNDER SIEGE From his crass family keptocracy to his dangerous war on the free press and now the lies-ridden Russian collusion scandal, warning signs abound for the republic
